reviews: Spicy Chicken Ramen above average spicy was delicious.  I loved the broth and complex favors. Very good! The purple storm drink was definitely not for me. The grape jelly in the bottom ruined the drink. Over all I recommend Honolulu Poke!

Delicious Ramen. I have tried at least 4 different types and they were all delicious and had different levels of spiciness as well. My favorite one is the chili pork ramen. The bubble tea and black bubble tea are also delicious.

Lots of options for ramen, poke and curry! And they have appetizers. They're quick and I'd say best ramen in town! Here almost every week 😅 I recommend the spicy chicken ramen, chicken curry, and takoyaki. My favorites.

Both the Ramen and the Poke are very good. I love the way they cook the pork belly 😋 I'm really happy about having this place in Cheyenne, this town needs more restaurant varieties. The prices are quite reasonable for the amount of food you get too
Great food! Great service. Would recommend 100%

name: Arby's
reviews: Omg, the brown sugar bacon that they have right now is amazing! So crispy and the perfect balance of sweet and salty. Also got the Cheddar roast beef - delicious as always and onion rings - perfectly crisp out of the fryer. The employees were friendly, efficient, and were on top of keeping the dining area clean. Everything I hope for when eating out at a fast food joint!
Friendly and fast! Went in with a large to go order and we got our food with no mistakes and wait time was shorter than I thought it would be!
Good food and quickly served during a busy time. The area was clean and well kept. I wouldn't hesitate to come back here when I need some "fast" food.
Pretty good, and service had a good attitude. Order was correct. Don't recommend brisket it was very dry.
The best arby's in town recommend going out of your way for this one

name: Paramount Ballroom
reviews: Charming cocktail bar in downtown Cheyenne. Walking distance to downtown hotels and a few other restaurants.  They have small plates and fantastic cocktails.  We tried a small sampling and they all tasted great with unique flavors.  Would definitely recommend to anyone in town!
Drinks are.good but not strong. Friendly light place. Snacks like deviled eggs and cheese board are excellent.

I loved the atmosphere here. You can actually hold a conversation. Great, original drinks, good food, excellent service. I feel like we've been waiting for a place like this in Cheyenne, and now it's here! We will definitely be back.

Love this place! Great cocktails and super friendly staff. You can tell the bartenders love what they do because they were really open to answering questions and helping me find something I would love. Definately reccomend!!! I had the girl in a kimono 😘👍🔥

I've been here many, many times. The atmosphere has consistently been superior to any place in Cheyenne, but unfortunately that is all. Over time the service and quality of food & drink has plummeted. Drinks are frequently cloying and lack the balance they once had, food lacks the flavour of even a couple months ago, and the service has become increasingly insufferable. The owner frequently has walked by people who have yet to be waited on without acknowledgement. I want to continue to support Paramount Ballroom, but their drinks just aren't worth the price anymore.

name: Best Tacos y Burritos La Paz
reviews: Not a bad little spot. Ordered two different kinds of burritos and they were both great. The biggest criticism I have has to do with how dry the meat was -- not the end of the world but definitely noticeable. The portions are great for the price (a big burrito is $4.75 if I recall correctly).  The owners are both really nice people too. I'd definitely stop by here again next time I pass through Cheyenne.
Lives up to its name! Seriously the best tacos and burritos in town, the barbacoa beef is probably the best choise but all of them are great.

This place is terrible! Pretty sure my meat was rotten. Smelt terrible and made me super sick. I'm Mexican and just moved here from Denver so I know good tacos. But this place is nothing like I'm use to. They don't have many options of meats and toppings. Stay away.

OMG....the place rates a zero for ambiance,  but if you want the best burrito this side of the Rio it scores 5 stars. Order it with everything, rice, beans, onions, salsa, cilantro, queso, and any meat selection. You will not he disappointed! F A B U L O U S!!@
Excellent...going BK to shop

name: Dickey's Barbecue Pit
address: 1400 Dell Range Blvd Spc 85A Ste 085A, Cheyenne, WY 82009, USA
reviews: Great barbecue. I had the 2 plate meal and the chicken and turkey I picked were freaking amazing. Great flavor, extremely moist. The line was long but it went pretty quick. A little pricey for the amount of meat and sides they give you, but at least it tasted pretty dang good.

Andrew was awesome.
The rest of Dickeys is terrible.
There websight is a failure. There delivery is a failure. They cant except cash is a failure?
It appears as if there is upper management failure.
Corporate should get there act together.
Unfortunate that the kid working working there seems to know more then corporate does on how to get things done.

Dickeys usually fills me up.. but this time, no way. We obviously got food to go, considering covid19, & their side to go cups are SMALL as heck & they were so stingy with the food :( thank goodness I had enough meat in my sandwich, but I got a picture of the Mac and cheese, and they didn’t bother filling to the top. We spent $26 when we could’ve went to Taco Bell & got waaayy more food for less than half the price. So disappointed because I use to LOVE Dickeys! :( :(

Hey for recent info. Dont order ahead of time expecting it to be ready. I call at 6:15 for my order to be ready at 7:30. It was not then when I called in I was told to tell the guy at the door I was here and waiting. The guy at the door was very rude when I explained I was condused on how the whole thing worked and told him my name.
Great food!  Love the barbecue and the macaroni.  Our company used them to cater and it was fantastic.

name: Corner Cafe LLC
reviews: The food is fresh and very fast.  The owner is nice too.
